title: Exit Teleport (Mage Training Arena)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Exit Teleport is a teleportation portal located in all the minigame rooms in the Mage Training Arena - Alchemists' Playground, Enchanting Chamber, Creature Graveyard, and Telekinetic Theatre. Entering this portal allows the player to exit the current minigame room and go back to the entrance hall.

Advanced data
Object ID23677

The Exit Teleport is a teleportation portal located in all the minigame rooms in the Mage Training Arena - Alchemists' Playground, Enchanting Chamber, Creature Graveyard, and Telekinetic Theatre. Entering this portal allows the player to exit the current minigame room and go back to the entrance hall.

While the Creature Graveyard and Telekinetic Theatre rooms have only one exit teleport each, the Alchemists' Playground has two exit teleports located next to each other and the Enchanting Chamber has even four.

The '''Exit Teleport''' is a teleportation [[portal]] located in all the minigame rooms in the [[Mage Training Arena]] - [[Mage_Training_Arena#Alchemist's_Playground|Alchemists' Playground]], [[Mage_Training_Arena#Enchanting_Chamber|Enchanting Chamber]], [[Mage_Training_Arena#Creature_Graveyard|Creature Graveyard]], and [[Mage_Training_Arena#Telekinetic_Theatre|Telekinetic Theatre]]. Entering this portal allows the player to exit the current minigame room and go back to the entrance hall.

While the Creature Graveyard and Telekinetic Theatre rooms have only one exit teleport each, the Alchemists' Playground has two exit teleports located next to each other and the Enchanting Chamber has even four.
